燰燰燰

燰字的基本解释

燰
wēi
古同“煨”。

燰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wēi］
［《廣韻》烏恢切，平灰，影。］
亦作“燰1”。
(1)热灰。
(2)把生的食物放在带火的灰里使烧熟。
(3)烹饪法。用微火慢慢地煮。
(4)焚烧。
(5)中药制法之一。将药材用湿润面粉包裹，在锅里炒热的滑石粉中加热至外皮焦黄为度；或层层隔纸加热，以除去部分油分。

燰字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　燰； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页685第19
【篇海】烏灰切，音隈。煨火也。

燰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
燰字的起名意思

暂无。

燰
Basic explanation of words
燰
wēi
Gu Tong "simmered".
燰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wēi］
["Guang Yun" Wu Hui cut, flat gray, shadow. ]
Also known as "燰1".
(1) Hot ash.
(2) Put raw food in ashes on fire to cook.
(3) Cooking method. Boil slowly over low heat.
(4) Incineration.
(5) One of the preparation methods of traditional Chinese medicine. Wrap the medicinal materials with moist flour, and heat them in the talcum powder that is fried in a pan until the outer skin is browned; or heat layer by layer with separate paper to remove part of the oil.
燰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　燰; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 685 Page 19
[Pianhai] Black gray cut, sound kuma. Simmer the fire too.
燰
